body:
Recent announcements- Intro's will most likely be delayed. If you haven't hear yet, I reset my PC 1-2 weeks ago, Im still needing my packs back, thank you!

Channel- https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCP_0P9rfAnBU95pzYpHpqyw

Avicus Videos in order (A-Z)
 
Nebula 001 ||
Intro - Galrandir || (Download...)
Intro - Jive || (Download...)
Intro - Dragonita || (Youtuber) (5K) (She Might use it)
Intro - Sycron || (Download...)
Kohi - 2v2's || Phyre & BlamePotLag (Shaw) vs. Exclusive & ItsFash
    (Toggle sprint is allowed on kohi, I'm not using it on Avicus).

Leve a liek and sub... I want them. <3
